short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replacing youtube thumbnails with clear background images and titles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more clickbait thumbnails. Replace YouTube thumbnails with clean, static images and video titles only.This extension allows you to hide all YouTube thumbnails (including Shorts, playlists, and recommended videos) and display their titles only.

- Hide clickbait thumbnails to increase productivity and avoid procrastination.
- Increase your peace of mind and avoid distractions from unintended videos.
- Hide inappropriate content during public presentations or classes.

Additional features:
- Turn this extension on/off in the user panel.
- Show original thumbnails when hovering the mouse over them.
- Customize image and text colors.
- Reset colors to default values at any time.
